data.title: Future Rock Legends
meta_keywords: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
data.meta_description: Will Al Jarreau be inducted into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame?
data.text:
Al Jarreau should, most definitely, be in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame. He should have been able to see it done in his lifetime. R.I.P.

Mr. Jarreau, thanks for the great music!

Posted by Raye on Sunday, 08/21/2022 @ 21:47pm

Al Jarreau should be in the Rock and Roll Hall of fame. He was a Grammy,Emmy winner a won in 5 categories in the Grammies. A one of a kind singer whose voice is magical, memorable. Rock and Roll Hall of Fame should have Al Jarreau in it

Posted by Rhoda Friedman on Monday, 01/1/2024 @ 21:38pm
